question: Which payment provider along with the National Payments Corporation of India, has launched “RuPay SoftPoS”?
explanation:
The SBI Cards & Payment Services has joined hands with the National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) to launch “RuPay SoftPoS”.
The solution aims to offer all-in-one and cost-effective acceptance infrastructure to retailers. The platform. The merchants can convert their existing android smartphone devices into a payment terminal by downloading a supported application.
